type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Rogue Knight
rules_text:
Reach
[i]Cupid's Arrow[/i] – Archers you control have haste.
[i]Killer Bow [/i]– Whenever an Archer or Rogue you control deals damage to an opponent who doesn't have the lowest life among your opponents, exile the top card of that player's library. You may play cards exiled this way until end of turn and may spend mana of any color to cast those spells.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{B}{R}
